sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthtrsmrcvmntrngloginfo ( log_id , cntc_id , test_class_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm ) VALUES ( #logId# , #cntcId# , #testClassNm# , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAdres# , #mntrngSttus# , #logInfo# , #creatDt# , #frstRegisterId# , SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthtrsmrcvmntrngloginfo SET log_id = #logId# , cntc_id = #cntcId# , test_class_nm = #testClassNm# , mngr_nm = #mngrNm# , mngr_email_adres = #mngrEmailAdres# , mntrng_sttus = #mntrngSttus# , log_info = #logInfo# , creat_dt = #creatDt# , last_updusr_id = #lastUpdusrId# , last_updt_pnttm = SYSDATE WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM comthtrsmrcvmntrngloginfo WHERE 1 = 1 AND log_id = #logId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT log_id , cntc_id , test_class_nm , mngr_nm , mngr_email_adres , mntrng_sttus , log_info , creat_dt , frst_register_id , frst_regist_pnttm , last_updusr_id , last_updt_pnttm FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE log_id = #logId#

SELECT A.LOG_ID , A.CNTC_ID , A.TEST_CLASS_NM , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , A.MNTRNG_STTUS , A.LOG_INFO , A.CREAT_DT , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID , A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID , A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM ( SELECT LOG_ID , CNTC_ID , TEST_CLASS_NM , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , MNTRNG_STTUS , LOG_INFO , CREAT_DT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , ROWNUM FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword#
CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTHTRSMRCVMNTRNGLOGINFO WHERE 1=1
LOG_ID = #searchKeyword#
CNTC_ID LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
